# we-switch



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property            | Attribute     | Description                                                       | Type      | Default     |
| ------------------- | ------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ----------- |
| `checked`           | `checked`     | Default value of switch when component is rendered the first time | `boolean` | `false`     |
| `labelLeft`         | `label-left`  | Text put in the left of switch                                    | `string`  | `undefined` |
| `labelRight`        | `label-right` | Text put in the right of switch                                   | `string`  | `undefined` |
| `name` _(required)_ | `name`        | Name of switch, put in the payload of changeCallback event        | `string`  | `undefined` |


## Events

| Event                  | Description                                                                                         | Type               |
| ---------------------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------ |
| `changeSwitchCallback` | Event triggered any time user change the state of the switch putting in the payload name and status | `CustomEvent<any>` |


## CSS Custom Properties

| Name                       | Description                                                                               |
| -------------------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| `--after--background`      | Background of button switch <br> Default: rgba(255, 255, 255, 1)                          |
| `--after--border-radius`   | Border radius of button switch <br> Default: 50%                                          |
| `--after--height`          | Height of button switch <br> Default: 1em                                                 |
| `--after--left`            | Distance from left of icon switch <br> Default: 0.313em                                   |
| `--after--top`             | Distance from top of button switch <br> Default: 0.22em                                   |
| `--after--transition`      | Transition options about the changement of button switch <br> Default: 0.3s               |
| `--after--width`           | Width of button switch <br> Default: 1em                                                  |
| `--background-checked`     | Background color of switch when change from initial condition <br> Default: #3F51B5       |
| `--container--font-size`   | Font size of labels inside the switch <br> Default: 2em                                   |
| `--container--font-weight` | Font weight of labels inside the switch <br> Default: bold                                |
| `--container--height`      | Height of container <br> Default: 1.5em                                                   |
| `--container--width`       | Width of container <br> Default: 3em                                                      |
| `--switch--background`     | Background color of switch when in initial condition <br> Default: rgba(128, 128, 128, 1) |
| `--switch--border-radius`  | Border radius of switch <br> Default: 6.250em                                             |
| `--switch--cursor`         | Cursor on switch <br> Default: pointer                                                    |


----------------------------------------------
